original_text: And the Spirit of the Lord came mightily upon him, and he rent him as he would have rent a kid, and he had nothing in his hand: but he told not his father or his mother what he had done.
korean_text: 여호와의 영이 삼손에게 강하게 임하니 그가 손에 아무것도 없이 그 사자를 염소 새끼를 찢는 것 같이 찢었으나 그는 자기가 행한 일을 부모에게 알리지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the Spirit of the Lord came mightily upon him
as he would have rent a kid
sentences.korean_translation: 염소 새끼를 찢는 것 같이 하였으나

sentences.original_text: and he had nothing in his hand
but he told not his father or his mother
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 아버지나 어머니에게 고하지 않고
